        public boolean checkLabelPosition(java.awt.geom.Point2D coordinates,
                                  java.awt.geom.Point2D positionState,
                                  java.awt.geom.Point2D windowPosition)
        Checks if the Component's Label is positioned at the clicked coordinates
        Parameters:
        coordinates - The coordinates of a click event
        positionState - The Party's position
        windowPosition - The SubWindow's position
        Returns:
        true if label positioned at clicked coordinates
